patents.title: Electronic loupe
patents.abstract: An electronic loupe device that provides enhanced magnification capabilities with digital features such as image capture, measurement, and augmented display functionality.

patents.title: Method and system for providing assistance for cognitively impaired users by utilizing artificial intelligence
patents.abstract: A system utilizing artificial intelligence to provide assistance for cognitively impaired users. The system includes adaptive interfaces and personalized support features.

patents.title: System and method for adjusting audio parameters for a user
patents.abstract: A system that automatically adjusts audio parameters based on user preferences, environmental conditions, and real-time feedback to provide an optimal listening experience.

patents.title: Tracking for traffic lights
patents.abstract: A system for tracking and monitoring traffic light status, timing, and patterns to improve traffic flow management and provide data for autonomous vehicle navigation.

patents.title: Monolitholic LED chip to emit multiple colors
patents.abstract: A light emitting diode chip with red, green and blue light emission regions on a single substrate. The light emission regions may be powered selectively to only emit one color light at a time. Or all three regions may be powered simultaneously so that the LED chip emits white light.
